faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Konvertix
faq.noResults: No results found. Try different keywords or contact support.

0.question: What is Konvertix and how does it work?
0.answer: Konvertix is a comprehensive marketing analytics platform that helps businesses track, analyze, and optimize their marketing campaigns across multiple channels. It integrates with your existing tools to provide unified insights and actionable recommendations.

1.question: How do I get started with Konvertix?
1.answer: Getting started is easy! Sign up for a free trial, connect your marketing accounts (Google Ads, Facebook, etc.), and our onboarding wizard will guide you through the setup process. You'll have insights flowing within minutes.

2.question: What integrations does Konvertix support?
2.answer: Konvertix integrates with 200+ marketing tools including Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, Google Analytics, Shopify, WooCommerce, HubSpot, Salesforce, and many more.

3.question: Is there a free trial available?
3.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required to start your trial.

0.question: What kind of reports can I generate?
0.answer: Konvertix offers comprehensive reporting including campaign performance, ROI analysis, attribution modeling, conversion tracking, audience insights, and custom dashboards. All reports can be automated and scheduled for delivery.

1.question: Can I track conversions across multiple channels?
1.answer: Absolutely! Our cross-channel attribution modeling tracks the entire customer journey from first touch to conversion, giving you a complete picture of how your marketing channels work together.

2.question: Does Konvertix offer automation features?
2.answer: Yes, Konvertix includes powerful automation features like automated bid management, budget optimization, alert systems, and automated reporting. You can set rules to optimize campaigns automatically based on your KPIs.

3.question: How accurate is the data in Konvertix?
3.answer: Our platform uses advanced data reconciliation and validation techniques to ensure 99.9% data accuracy. We cross-reference data from multiple sources and apply machine learning to detect and correct discrepancies.

0.question: What pricing plans are available?
0.answer: We offer flexible pricing plans starting from $10/month for basic analytics up to enterprise solutions. Plans include Basic ($10/month), Business ($20/month), and Enterprise ($40/month) for general analytics, plus specialized SEO and Full Service plans.

1.question: Can I change my plan at any time?
1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any billing adjustments on your next invoice.

2.question: Is there a setup fee?
2.answer: No setup fees! All our plans include free onboarding and setup assistance. Our team will help you get up and running at no additional cost.

3.question: Do you offer custom enterprise solutions?
3.answer: Yes, we offer custom enterprise solutions with dedicated support, custom integrations, advanced security features, and SLA guarantees. Contact our sales team to discuss your specific requirements.

0.question: What support options are available?
0.answer: We offer 24/7 chat support, email support with 4-hour response time, phone support for enterprise customers, comprehensive documentation, video tutorials, and webinar training sessions.

1.question: Is my data secure with Konvertix?
1.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade security including SSL encryption, SOC 2 compliance, GDPR compliance, regular security audits, and data centers with 99.9% uptime. Your data is never shared with third parties.

2.question: Can I export my data?
2.answer: Yes, you can export all your data at any time in multiple formats including CSV, Excel, PDF, and via our API. We believe your data belongs to you and should always be accessible.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Have questions? We've got answers. Here are some common questions about our services.

0.question: How quickly can we get started?
0.answer: We can typically get you set up within 24-48 hours after our initial consultation. Our onboarding process is streamlined to get you seeing results fast.

1.question: What's included in the free trial?
1.answer: Our 14-day free trial includes full access to all features, dedicated support, and a strategy session with our team to help you get the most out of the platform.

2.question: Do you offer custom integrations?
2.answer: Yes! We offer custom integrations with your existing tools and platforms. Our technical team can work with you to ensure seamless data flow across your marketing stack.

3.question: What kind of support do you provide?
3.answer: We provide 24/7 chat support, dedicated account management for enterprise clients, and comprehensive onboarding with training sessions for your team.

questions.question: How do I get started with Konvertix?

questions.question: What integrations are available?
questions.answer: Konvertix integrates with Google Analytics, Facebook Ads, Google Ads, Shopify, WooCommerce, and many other popular marketing and e-commerce platforms.

questions.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can change your subscription plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and billing is prorated accordingly.

questions.question: Is there a mobile app available?
questions.answer: Currently, Konvertix is available as a web application optimized for mobile browsers. A dedicated mobile app is in development.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions about Konvertix
faq.noResults: No results found. Try different keywords.

0.question: How does billing work?
0.answer: Billing is processed monthly on the date you signed up. You'll receive an invoice via email 3 days before your billing date. All major credit cards and PayPal are accepted.

1.question: Can I change my plan anytime?
1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and billing is prorated based on your usage.

2.question: Do you offer refunds?
2.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all new subscriptions. If you're not satisfied, contact our support team for a full refund.

3.question: What payment methods do you accept?
3.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for enterprise accounts.

0.question: How do I connect my advertising accounts?
0.answer: Go to Settings > Integrations and click 'Connect' next to your advertising platform. You'll be redirected to authorize Konvertix to access your account data.

1.question: Why is my campaign data not showing?
1.answer: Data sync can take 15-30 minutes after connecting an account. If data is still missing after an hour, check your account permissions and try reconnecting.

2.question: How often is campaign data updated?
2.answer: Campaign data is updated every 15 minutes for real-time insights. Historical data is refreshed daily to ensure accuracy.

3.question: Can I track multiple ad accounts?
3.answer: Yes, you can connect multiple ad accounts from the same platform or different platforms. Each account will appear separately in your dashboard.

0.question: How do I export my data?
0.answer: Click the 'Export' button on any report page. You can export data in CSV, Excel, or PDF format. Custom date ranges and filters are preserved in exports.

1.question: Can I schedule automated reports?
1.answer: Yes, go to Reports > Scheduled Reports to set up daily, weekly, or monthly automated reports. Reports will be emailed to specified recipients.

2.question: What's the data retention period?
2.answer: We retain your data for 2 years on all paid plans. Free trial data is kept for 90 days after trial expiration.

3.question: How accurate is the attribution data?
3.answer: Our attribution model uses advanced algorithms with 95%+ accuracy. We track cross-device and cross-platform interactions for comprehensive attribution.

0.question: What browsers are supported?
0.answer: Konvertix works best on Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge (latest versions). We recommend Chrome for optimal performance.

1.question: Is there an API available?
1.answer: Yes, we offer a comprehensive REST API for enterprise customers. API documentation and access keys are available in your account settings.

2.question: Do you offer custom integrations?
2.answer: Yes, our technical team can build custom integrations for enterprise clients. Contact sales to discuss your specific requirements.

3.question: What's your uptime guarantee?
3.answer: We guarantee 99.9% uptime with redundant servers and automatic failover. Any downtime is credited to your account automatically.

0.question: How do I get started?
0.answer: Sign up for a free trial, connect your marketing accounts, and our onboarding wizard will guide you through the setup process. You'll have insights flowing within minutes.

1.question: Is my data secure?
1.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade security including SSL encryption, SOC 2 compliance, GDPR compliance, and regular security audits. Your data is never shared with third parties.

2.question: Do you offer training?
2.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive onboarding, video tutorials, webinar training sessions, and dedicated customer success managers for enterprise accounts.

3.question: Can I cancel anytime?
3.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. Your account will remain active until the end of your current billing period.
